content: Hey, @Josh Triplett : I have an action item to “review and merge” lang-team#113. I put a slew of review comments, and if you want, I can just do the edits for them and merge it. But I had one question that I could not answer: The use of potential synonyms “mutable” ~ “reversible and “immutable” ~ “irreversible” … So I do not want to merge it until that main question is addressed.
